briefdescription.para: Occurs whenever the filtering is done.

memberdef.argsstring: (string tableName, ArrayList columns, string title="", string additionalColumnFilter="", Icon windowIcon=null)
memberdef.name: AdvancedFilter

briefdescription.para: Create a new AdvancedFilter dialog with the specified table name, columns, and optional title.

parameterdescription.para: The table name in the backing database.
The column options available for the user to select from. This ArrayList must contain items of type DBMap.
The optional title displayed in the titlebar of this dialog.
The optional, additional filter to search by. Example: company_id=1

briefdescription.para: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
Clean up any resources being used.

parameterdescription.para: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: This is an advanced filter dialog that makes use of the classes in the utility.Filtering namespace.

detaileddescription.para: To filter, a user adds a row to the DataGridView by using the combo boxes and text input, along with a drop-down button with two BooleanOps (AND, OR).

To use this dialog, an ArrayList of columns of type DBMap must be provided to populate the combo boxes. The table name in the actual database must also be provided for use in creating the final query string.
